metadata.description: Daredevil and the Punisher vie for the soul of Hell's Kitchen as half of the East Coast's underworld- in chaos since Wilson Fisk, the Kingpin of crime, was deposed- scramble for their shot at the big chair. And as the city descends into chaos- as murder and intimidation become the staples of the day- Daredevil and the Punisher each seek to restore order in their own unique way.
metadata.name: Daredevil vs. Punisher
